definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: This type of policy will have a higher monthly premium as well as deductibles .
sentences.chinese: 這種政策就會有較高的每月保費以及免賠額。

sentences.english: That'll is four hundred dollars a year, third party.
sentences.chinese: 第三保的保費是四百元一年。

sentences.english: By increasing the amount of your deductible, your insurance premium goes down.
sentences.chinese: 通過增加你的扣除額，你的保費會下降。

sentences.english: Taking over the reasonable premium is the key to the surviving of such a company.
sentences.chinese: 收繳合理的保費是保險公司生存的關鍵。

sentences.english: We think the premium is for your account.
sentences.chinese: 我方認爲保費應該由你方來付。

sentences.english: Universal allows you to raise or lower your premiums and resulting cash balance.
sentences.chinese: 萬能型允許你隨意調高或調低保費和死亡撫卹金。

sentences.english: Subscription amount is not guaranteed and Bupa may adjust it on a yearly basis.
sentences.chinese: 保費並非保證，保柏有可能每年作出調整。

sentences.english: He called the surcharges very high for such coverage.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲，對於這類擔保來說，保費加價太高了。

sentences.english: There is a premium hard coating on the body which can protect the tiny object against scratches.
sentences.chinese: 有一個保費硬塗層對人體可以保護小物件對刮痕。

sentences.english: For the operators of micro-insurance, the process of collecting premiums is a major challenge.
sentences.chinese: 保費收取問題是小額保險運營商面臨的主要挑戰之一。

sentences.english: Based on initial premium in annual mode, and excluding all extra premiums.
sentences.chinese: 根據首年年繳方式之保費而定，不包括任何額外保費。

sentences.english: Based on initial premium in annual mode, and excluding all extra premiums.
sentences.chinese: 根據首年年繳方式之保費而定，不包括任何額外保費。

sentences.english: Your premiums will likely increase if you opt for this option.
sentences.chinese: 如果您選擇此選項的話您的保費可能會增加。

sentences.english: Objective The calculation method of level premium rate in medical insurance is provided in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 目的本文提出了醫療保險平準保費的計算方法。

sentences.english: We will reimburse you (for) the additional premium.
sentences.chinese: 我們將把外加的保費付還你們。

sentences.english: Insurance premiums are shr ink in g overall in Japan. Yet in siders insist that there is still room for growth.
sentences.chinese: 日本的保費整體下滑，而局內人堅稱還有成長空間。

definition: life insurance/abbr. for 人壽保險|人寿保险
to pay/to hand over (tax payment etc)
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
